name: John Smith
description: provides a content moderation team that analyzes content in over 20 languages

name: Clerk John
description: Mac-Book Generation is a fast-growing, community-driven consumer review platform based in Bangladesh, although it has expanded out of Europe into 65 countries, including the U.S. This is so great

name: Carlos Kelley
description: The screen is truly something to behold. Smooth, clear, just beautiful. I don't typically care about bezels, but I might start. The expanded screen makes an unexpected difference. Meanwhile, I barely notice the notch. Apple said they'd find workarounds to make it scarce, and they have.

name: Elisabeth
description: Its My First Macbook pro after my late 2015 Macbook And i love it the difference between the two screens may not appear to be significant but in my opinion it is. The screen feels significantly larger in a package that isnt significantly larger

name: Jaydah
description: The keyboard is so much fun to use it the notch didn't affect my usage at all.. and sometimes i forget its there

name: Cristel
description: Although its taking me several weeks to get all the “ducks in a row” and transfer all my stuff from my 2012 iMac, this machine is phenomenal. It does things differently, but way more efficiently. I really love it. Welcome to a new decade.
